name: FileSaver
description:
FileSaver it's an action-arcade game with 12 levels and 2 game modes: speedrun mode (end the levels in the shortest possible time) and endless mode (survive as long as you can).

You're a bit that has the mission of saving  the central computer from an evil virus that wants to end with tecnology in the world.

CONTROLS:

W - up, A - left, S - down, D - right, P - pause, ESC - exit.
